docs.text:
Sibyl


Sibyl from 
Startup.ML
 is an anomaly detection tool optimized for high-dimensional, heterogeneous (both categorical and continuous) datasets.   Its time complexity is near linear and space complexity is quadratic to the number of dimensions.

license terms
 before installing and using Sibyl.

docs.text: Sibyl from  Startup.ML  is an anomaly detection tool optimized for high-dimensional, heterogeneous (both categorical and continuous) datasets.   Its time complexity is near linear and space complexity is quadratic to the number of dimensions.

docs.text:
Examples


from sibyl import Sibyl
data = pandas.read_csv('expanded.csv', header=None)

# Return anomaly score for every sample in the dataset
sibyl_data = Sibyl(data)
score_vec = sibyl_data.score_dataset(50, 100)

# Return anomaly score for a single random instance from the dataset
rand_instance = data.iloc[30]
score_30 = sibyl_data.score_instance(rand_instance, 50, 100)
docs.title: Examples

docs.text:
from sibyl import Sibyl
data = pandas.read_csv('expanded.csv', header=None)

# Return anomaly score for every sample in the dataset
sibyl_data = Sibyl(data)
score_vec = sibyl_data.score_dataset(50, 100)

# Return anomaly score for a single random instance from the dataset
rand_instance = data.iloc[30]
score_30 = sibyl_data.score_instance(rand_instance, 50, 100)
